newsitem.title: USA: Akorn Inc Q1 net loss vs profit.
newsitem.headline: Akorn Inc Q1 net loss vs profit.

text.p: NOTE: Q1 1997 includes a $1.5 million charge for Opthalmic division relocation expenses and a $200,000 charge for a change in timing of manufacturing absorption of overhead.
Company said Q1 1996 is restated to include the acquisition of Pasadena Research Laboratories Inc under pooling of interests accounting treatment.
